profile_positions.description:
- Organising trainings and capacity building programs for tax administrations in Europe, Africa, Asia and Americas.
- Acquisition and fundraising – responsible for the acquisition of projects in the designated areas. 
- Account management - retain clients’ relationship and grow those opportunities, develop a long-term strategic partnership.
- Preparing tenders and expressions of interest.
- Administration and logistical coordination of the projects, organization of suitable human and other resources into a project environment, invoicing of, project documentation management, etc.
- Liaison with internal and external experts to maintain a wide network of experts for projects and programs.
- Looking for partners and organisations for joint initiatives (events, research) in the tax community, cooperation with other international and regional tax organisations and development agencies.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager in Government Consultancy Department

profile_positions.company: Intra-European Organisation of Tax Administrations - IOTA
profile_positions.description:
- Develop strategies to improve communications, increase visibility, innovate products.
- Establish and manage the social media accounts of the organisation.
- Communication and PR of the workshops, publications and other products and services; website news items, newsletters, videos, leaflets, etc.
- Manage publications projects; identify hot topics for tax administrations, find authors and contributors, liaise with external editors, sponsors and designers.
- Relations management: regular contacts with tax officials from the 44 member tax administrations, promote activities and identify needs. Establish and maintain relations with tax experts from partner organisations, businesses and academia; promote activities and identify potential areas of cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Communication and Publication Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Organise conferences, round table discussions, seminars, workshops: find partners and sponsors, create budget, find speakers, draft agenda, choose venue of event and accommodation. 
- Communication and PR of the events, contacts with media. 
- Plan and produce publications, liaising with contributors and external editors, sponsors, designers and printers. 
- Creation of the new website of the Foundation, content writing and content management, online publications.
- Network development: establish and maintain contacts with researchers, politicians, potential sponsors and with academic institutions with similar profile.
- Coordination of research programs (Balkans, Turkey, energy, security), hold lectures and presentations in domestic and international conferences.
profile_positions.title: Programme Director

company.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Hungary

profile_positions.description:
- Prepare reports, analysis and forecasts (economy, politics, EU integration, culture) and coordinate the reporting activity of the diplomatic staff.
- Promote Hungarian business and lobby for Hungarian business interests.
- Arrange media appearances for Hungary in host country, monitor the media coverage.
- Ensure that the embassy website is up to date and informative.
- Hungarian EU Presidency activity; coordination with EU embassies, the EU Delegation and other international organizations, co-chair the EU Deputy Head of Missions meetings.
- Build and maintain relationships with key government leaders and other opinion formers such as journalists, businessmen, heads of NGO’s.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Head of Mission of the Embassy of Hungary in Turkey

profile_positions.description:
- Analysis of the Euro-Atlantic integration process of Western Balkan countries, contribution to the preparation of the related part of the Hungarian EU Presidency Strategy.   
- Participating in the organisation of the international conference “Bosnia and Herzegovina - a Road towards Stabilization, Prosperity and European Integration” (5-6 November, 2009, Budapest).
- Liaison officer the meeting of the Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Visegrad Group (V4) and Western Balkans (6 October, Budapest)
profile_positions.title: Special Advisor (Western Balkans and Turkey Department)

company.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Hungary

profile_positions.description:
- Analysis of Bulgaria’s EU integration process and the first years of membership in the EU.
- Participation in the organisation and promotion of events (conferences, exhibitions, concerts, receptions, balls, dinners, etc.) organised or supported by the embassy. 
- Monitor the media coverage of Hungary and other relevant news, preparing regular press reports.
- Establish and maintaining public and government relations, relations with media, private sector, NGO’s, academic institutions, foundations, liaise with diplomatic representations accredited to the host country.
- Promote Hungarian business and lobby for Hungarian business interests.
profile_positions.title: EU attaché of the Embassy of Hungary in Bulgaria

profile_positions.description:
- Preparation and organisation of domestic and international consultations, meetings and visits of the Political State Secretary. Travel, accommodation, program, reports, interviews, press release. 
- Participation in the internal and external communication activity of the cabinet of the Political State Secretary, media relations.
- Management of the Fund of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs for Southeast Europe (proposal for the projects of NGO’s), representation of State Secretary at the project selection meetings.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant to the Political State Secretary

company.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Hungary

profile_positions.description:
- Domestic communication of the European Convention, promoting the involvement of researchers and NGO’s in the work of the Hungarian Delegation to Convention.
- Domestic communication of Hungary’s joining the European Union, preparation of brochures, documents, leaflets, etc. Coordination of the work of European Information Points in Hungary.
profile_positions.title: Desk Officer of European Communication and Political Cooperation Department
